entry.title: Monday: Chance of snow. High minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow this morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 26 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CDT Monday 13 March 2023
